page.description: The ApplicationConfiguration object. It has properties that identify the platform and vary depending on the platform..

property.name: ServerProduct
property.description: The platform on which the application is running. May be AlphaCloud, ApplicationServerIIS or ApplicationServerClassic
property.note: See Alpha Cloud documentation Managing Applications for Alpha Cloud specific constants.
property.link: Alpha Cloud Managing Applications@/Guides/Alpha Cloud/Alpha Anywhere Developers Guide/Managing Applications.html#ManagingApplicationConstants
